fixes.name: WATM(d) T-1
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Numerator =
    SUMX(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DTM]
    )
VAR Denominator =
    SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)])
RETURN
    DIVIDE(Numerator, Denominator)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau SUM([Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)]*[DTM]) to DAX SUMX over the table for row-by-row multiplication, and SUM(...) for the denominator. Used DIVIDE for safe division. All column references were transformed to 'TableName'[ColumnName] format.
